com.sleepysim

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sleepysim.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class controls the network to run uninterruptedly and correctly.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller(java.lang.Integer node_count, java.lang.Integer adversary_count, java.lang.Integer delay, java.lang.Integer T, double difficulty)
      Create a controller and initialization, you should initial the whole network to initial the network, you have to generate secret-public key pairs for all node then initialize signature class tell every node about their secret key, and all public keys initialize adversary and networkcontrol by calling their construction function.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      This function determine if this node is the leader in this round.
      void run()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        Controller(java.lang.Integer node_count,
           java.lang.Integer adversary_count,
           java.lang.Integer delay,
           java.lang.Integer T,
           double difficulty)
        Create a controller and initialization, you should initial the whole network to initial the network, you have to generate secret-public key pairs for all node then initialize signature class tell every node about their secret key, and all public keys initialize adversary and networkcontrol by calling their construction function. You should tell networkcontrol about the node and delay, you must initialize all nodes first and store them into a ArrayList some code have been implemented, you can modify if you like.
        Parameters:
        node_count - total number of nodes
        adversary_count - total number of adversary
        delay - network max delay
        T - inconsistency threshold

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        This function runs the corrupted and honest nodes. When the chain is consistency, it will run all the nodes of the network. Run the honest nodes and then use adversary to run the corrupted nodes.

      • is_leader

        public boolean is_leader(java.lang.Integer id,
                         java.lang.Integer round)
        This function determine if this node is the leader in this round. If hash of this node in this round smaller than the difficulty, the node will be the leader.
        Parameters:
        id - - node id
        round - - current round
        Returns:
        return a boolean
